name: 3001: A Turkey Odyssey: Game Movie Premiere
blurb: Experience a true odyssey through a movie in which you play as the main character. For movie-lovers and game-lovers alike.

rewards.reward: EMBRYONIC \u2013 Thank you for contributing to the birth of 3001: A Turkey Odyssey! YOUR NAME will be emblazoned across the Early Supporters page on our website, where it will remain\u2026 forever!
INCUBATION \u2013 Get a DRM-free digital copy of the complete GAME on PC or receive a promo code for access to all game levels for iOS! Your name on the Early Supporters page.

CRACKED EGG \u2013 CHOOSE the digital platform you want the GAME on (choices dependent on our platform expansion stretch goals)! Also get two beautiful, exclusively-designed digital WALLPAPERS and a download of the digital SOUNDTRACK! Your name on the Early Supporters page.

HATCHED EGG \u2013 Get the game on TWO digital platforms of your choice (choices dependent on our platform expansion stretch goals)! You'll also get two digital WALLPAPERS, the SOUNDTRACK, plus the PDF version of our exclusive ART BOOK, filled with hundreds of gorgeous CGI art, including still frames frozen at just the right moment, extensive concept art, character portraits and more! Your name on the Early Supporters page!

SPREAD YOUR WINGS \u2013 ALL the rewards in the HATCHED EGG tier. Plus, get a PDF version of the SCREENPLAY of 3001: A Turkey Odyssey! See the birth of the idea and its visual manifestation in a digital download of the extensive STORYBOARD!

THE INKY FEATHER \u2013 ALL the rewards in the HATCHED EGG tier, plus a PHYSICAL copy of the SCREENPLAY of 3001: A Turkey Odyssey, SIGNED by the screenwriter herself! EARLY TURKEY SPECIAL: we\u2019ll throw in a physical copy of the STORYBOARD so you can see the foundation of all the CGI art and visual storytelling! (Add $10 to ship outside Canada and the US)

THE INKY FEATHER \u2013 ALL the rewards in the HATCHED EGG tier, plus a PHYSICAL copy of the SCREENPLAY of 3001: A Turkey Odyssey, SIGNED by the screenwriter herself! (Add $10 to ship outside Canada and the US)

CURATOR \u2013 ALL the rewards in the HATCHED EGG tier. Plus, get the PHYSICAL ART BOOK, so you can run your fingers repeatedly through the glossy pages! Suitable for any bookshelf or coffee table. (Add $10 to ship outside Canada and the US)

BLUEPRINT FOR EVOLUTION \u2013 ALL the rewards in the HATCHED EGG tier. Plus, a limited edition, SOFTCOVER ART TRANSFORMATIVE BOOK, detailing the evolution in character design, conceptual design and even deleted scenes. This is the true behind-the-scenes experience! (Add $10 to ship outside Canada and the US)

DIGITAL NEST \u2013 ALL the rewards in the HATCHED EGG tier. Plus, you get the supreme package: digital versions of EVERYTHING: the art book, screenplay, storyboards and art transformative book. You'll have BETA access to 3001: A Turkey Odyssey. Your NAME will flash across in a fit of fire and fury in the IN-GAME CREDITS!

EXPAND THE HORIZON \u2013 EARLY TURKEY SPECIAL: ALL the rewards in the DIGITAL NEST tier. Plus, your choice of TWO of the following: PHYSICAL art book, PHYSICAL art transformative book, PHYSICAL signed screenplay, PHYSICAL signed storyboard. (Add $20 to ship outside US and Canada. I'm heavy!)

EXPAND THE HORIZON \u2013 ALL the rewards in the DIGITAL NEST tier. Plus, your choice of TWO of the following: PHYSICAL art book, PHYSICAL art transformative book, PHYSICAL signed screenplay, PHYSICAL signed storyboard. (Add $20 to ship outside US and Canada. I'm heavy!)

GOLDEN NEST \u2013 ALL the rewards in the DIGITAL NEST tier. Plus, you get the ultimate package: PHYSICAL versions of EVERYTHING: the art book, the signed screenplay, the signed storyboard, AND the art transformative book! For every golden nest pledge, Turki grows a golden feather.

VISIONARY AUTEUR \u2013 ALL the rewards in the GOLDEN NEST tier. Plus, participate in the exclusive, 3001: VISIONARY AUTEUR tier only contest in which you submit your OWN CHARACTER DESIGN! Two characters will be chosen by fellow backers and become the main focus in two key scenes of the movie!

DREAM MAKER \u2013 For your fantastic contribution, you\u2019ll get EVERYTHING in the GOLDEN NEST tier, plus an extremely rare, collector\u2019s edition FIGURINE OF LOLA LOVE! You\u2019ll also get an AUTOGRAPHED PHOTO of the actress (signed by her main creator)! This is the ONLY way to get Lola.

ODYSSEUS \u2013 You get EVERYTHING in the GOLDEN NEST tier. Plus, have a one-on-one chat with a creator of your choice on Skype! And come to the launch party in New York (travel and accommodation not included)! You\u2019ll also be credited as the EXECUTIVE PRODUCER in the in-game credits!
